intro: Symbolanthus obscure-rosaceus, commonly known as the obscure-rosaceus symbolanthus, is a flowering plant belonging to the Malvaceae family. It is characterized by its distinctive, showy flowers that typically bloom in shades of pink and white. The plant features palmate leaves with five to seven lobes, giving it a unique appearance. It is native to certain regions of Africa and thrives in tropical and subtropical climates. Due to its ornamental value, it is occasionally cultivated in botanical gardens and as a landscape plant.
